casebody.data:
MERCANTILE BANK MORTGAGE COMPANY, LLC, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
NGPCP/BRYS CENTRE, LLC, and NGP Capital Partners, LLC, Defendants/Counterplaintiffs-Appellants,
and
Ford A. Grifo, Daniel J. Nemes, and Mark S. Provenzano, Defendants/Counterplaintiffs. SC: 158670-1
COA: 335600, 335715 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 2, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the September 27, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
